vulnerabilities.description: Issue summary: The POLY1305 MAC (message authentication code) implementation contains a bug that might corrupt the internal state of applications on the Windows 64 platform when running on newer X86_64 processors supporting the AVX512-IFMA instructions.
Issue summary: Processing some specially crafted ASN.1 object identifiers or data containing them may be very slow.
A security vulnerability has been identified in all supported versions of OpenSSL related to the verification of X.509 certificate chains.
A timing based side channel exists in the OpenSSL RSA Decryption implementation which could be sufficient to recover a plaintext across a network in a Bleichenbacher style attack.
Critical buffer overflow vulnerability in lwIP network stack that could lead to remote code execution
